author: juergen
msg: add the possibility to trace each creation of a SlideException via the logger.

author: juergen
msg: added entries for forbidden and conflict

author: juergen
msg: try to add some robustness code
1) retry to open the connection 5 times in case of an error
2) if the body could not be sent (e.g. the server was already finished) try to read the response and if available do not throw an error.
anyway this did not really help with our sporadic connect problems. The client gurus could take a look at the changes.

author: juergen
msg: commented the thread XML element. this is currently not used (by the forcomming test suite) and caused a compile error with JDOM b6.

author: juergen
msg: do not pack a deleteMacroExcept into a copyMacroExcept.
